posts.post_content:
Posted By: Tony Andrea
Circa 1880's-1890's cabinet photo of an unidentified black baseball player. Decked out with a nice hat, ring bat on shoulder, and ball in hand. It's extremely tough to find any baseball related items from this era that include black players and this ones a beauty. Overall size is 4-1/4"x6-1/2" and it's in wonderful condition. 
$685.00 delivered. Insurance & shipping on my dime. 
Please email me if interested at andreatny@qwest.net 
Thank you, Tony

[IMG]http://i9.photobucket.com/albums/a95/andreatny/africanamercabinet-2.jpg[/IMG]

Edited to add trades welcome in header. Thx, Tony

Posted By: Tony Andrea
I've gotten a few emails asking if I'd take trade towards the cabinet. "Yes", I would entertain any & all trade offers. Please feel free to send me anything you might want to horse swap for the cabinet.
Thanks to all who have emailed.

Regards, Tony

Posted By: Tony Andrea
Cabinet has been traded. Thanks to all who inquired.

Regards, Tony
